channel.title: 317 drop list help
channel.description:
Ok sorry to bug you guys with probably a stupid question but I looked around and couldn't find any answer to this question.
Ok I am wanting to change a Npc's drops so that it drops a item 1/100 times and another item 1/50 times so to say. How would I place the numbers and stuff here is the current for a Npc what does each number mean and how does it know what one is rarer then the other. Thanks.
#Kalphite Queen 1158:30 995:4585000 14479:1 19336:1 19337:1 19338:1 19339:1 19340:1 19341:1 19342:1 19343:1 19344:1 19345:1 19323:1
